sn47.45:1.1: “‘Kusalarasi’ti, bhikkhave, vadamano cattaro satipatthane samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn47.45:1.2: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, kusalarasi, yadidam—cattaro satipatthana.
sn47.45:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.45:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.45:2.6: ‘Kusalarasi’ti, bhikkhave, vadamano ime cattaro satipatthane samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn47.45:2.7: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, kusalarasi, yadidam—cattaro satipatthana”ti.
